metadata.title: AI Prompt Library - Top 10000+ AI Art, Video & Audio Prompts Collection
metadata.description: Curated collection of top AI prompts covering Midjourney, Stable Diffusion, Runway and more. Explore image generation, video creation, and music production cases to empower your creativity.

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.metaDescription: Learn about the vision and mission of AI Prompt Library. We are dedicated to providing the highest quality AI prompt resources for creators worldwide.
aboutPage.heroDescription: We are dedicated to providing creators, designers, and AI enthusiasts worldwide with the finest prompt resources
aboutPage.missionText: The mission of AI Prompt Library is to make the art of AI creation accessible to everyone. We believe that excellent prompts are the key to unlocking AI's potential, and our task is to forge that key for you.

whatWeDoItems.item1Text: We collect and curate the highest quality AI prompts from around the world, covering image generation, video creation, music production, and more.
whatWeDoItems.item2Text: Supporting prompts for mainstream AI models including Midjourney, Stable Diffusion, DALL-E, Runway, Sora, Suno, and more.
whatWeDoItems.item3Text: Our team continuously tracks the latest developments in AI, ensuring you always have access to the newest and most effective prompts.

valuesItems.value1Text: Knowledge should be shared. We firmly believe that open sharing enables the entire community to progress together.
valuesItems.value2Text: Every prompt is carefully selected to ensure we provide users with the highest quality content.
valuesItems.value3Text: Staying at the forefront of AI technology development, constantly exploring new possibilities.

aboutPage.contactText: If you have any questions, suggestions, or collaboration interests, feel free to reach out to us:

helpPage.title: Help Center
helpPage.metaDescription: Learn how to use AI Prompt Library, master prompt searching, copying, and usage tips to maximize your AI creative potential.
helpPage.heroDescription: Quickly learn how to use AI Prompt Library and unleash your creative potential

gettingStartedItems.item1Text: Browse our curated prompt cards on the homepage. Each card displays an effect preview and complete prompt content.
gettingStartedItems.item2Text: Use the search box to enter keywords, or filter by category, model, and tags to quickly find the prompts you need.
gettingStartedItems.item3Text: Click the copy button on the card to copy the prompt to your clipboard, then paste it into your AI tool.

faqItems.q1: How do I copy a prompt?
faqItems.a1: Click the 'Copy' button on the prompt card, and the prompt will be automatically copied to your clipboard. You can also click the card for details and copy from there.
faqItems.a2: Our prompts cover mainstream models including Midjourney, Stable Diffusion, DALL-E 3, Runway Gen-2, Sora, and Suno AI. Each prompt indicates which model it's designed for.
faqItems.a3: The prompts collected on this site are for learning and communication purposes only, prohibited for commercial use. For commercial use, please contact the original author for permission.
faqItems.q4: How can I submit my prompt?
faqItems.a4: We currently don't support direct user submissions, but you can contact us through our official channels to share your excellent work.
faqItems.q5: Why do some images load slowly?
faqItems.a5: Some images are sourced from external links, and loading speed may be affected by network conditions. We are continuously optimizing the image loading experience.

tipsItems.tip1Text: Combining multiple filter conditions helps you find your desired prompt style more precisely.
tipsItems.tip2Text: After copying a prompt, we recommend tweaking it according to your specific needs for the best results.
tipsItems.tip3Text: Different model versions may interpret prompts differently. Pay attention to the model indicated for each prompt.

helpPage.stillNeedHelpText: If your question isn't answered above, please contact us through our official channels and we'll respond as soon as possible.

hero.description: Curated collection of the finest AI prompts covering image generation, video creation, music production and more, empowering your creativity

footer.disclaimerText1: Most of the prompt examples collected on this site come from the internet and are for learning and communication purposes only. All examples have been attributed to their original sources whenever possible. Please contact us if any attribution is missing.
footer.disclaimerText2Part1: The content on this site is
footer.disclaimerText2Part2: . If you believe your rights have been infringed, please contact us to remove the relevant content.
footer.copyright: © {year} AI Prompt Library · For learning purposes only

seo.aboutTitle: About AI Prompt Library - Your Source for AI Creativity
seo.aboutText1: AI Prompt Library is a professional platform gathering high-quality prompts for AI art, video, and audio generation from around the globe. We are dedicated to providing inspiration for creators, designers, and AI enthusiasts, helping you better master advanced AI models like Midjourney, Stable Diffusion, Runway, and Sora.
seo.aboutText2: Whether you are looking for anime styles, photorealistic photography, 3D rendering effects, or need professional LOGO design and UI interface inspiration, you can find suitable Prompts here. Our database is updated in real-time, containing tens of thousands of verified high-quality prompt cases, making your AI creation more efficient and precise.
seo.categoriesTitle: Covering Mainstream AI Models and Styles
seo.categoriesText: We deeply integrate prompt resources for various popular AI tools, including but not limited to: Midjourney V6 for photorealism and artistic creation, Niji Journey for anime illustrations, Stable Diffusion XL (SDXL) for precise control, DALL-E 3 for semantic understanding, and AI video generation instructions for Runway Gen-2 and Pika Labs. In addition, we also provide Prompt guides for audio generation models like Suno AI.
seo.usageText: Browse our curated list, search by keywords, or filter by tags to find the image, video, or audio effects you like. Click on a card to view the complete Prompt parameters (including Negative Prompts, Aspect Ratio --ar, Stylize --s, etc.). One-click copy the Prompt to your AI tool to generate similar high-quality works. We recommend tweaking the prompts to spark even more creativity.
